'''A Little Fox's Daydream''' is a part of the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event.

It can be accessed from the {{Icon|A Little Fox's Daydream}} icon.

==Tutorials==
===Game Tips===

;A Little Fox's Daydream
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 1.png
|text1    = In "A Little Fox's Daydream," you must guide the little kitsune to pass through obstacles and avoid perils, and use torii gates to travel into different dreamscapes, collecting delicious Fried Tofu along the way, until you reach the ramen stall at your destination...
}}
;Dreamscapes
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 2.png
|text1    = You can {{Color|bp|switch dreamscapes}} between two states: sweet dreams and nightmares. If you encounter obstacles too hard to surmount, you might want to try switching dreamscape states to seek another path to the ramen stall.
}}
;Terrain
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 3.png
|text1    = As you progress, you might find illusory flooring or walls. This means that there is corresponding terrain in the other dreamscape state.
}}
;Jumping
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 4.png
|text1    = Jump to pass through inaccessible areas or avoid dangerous foes.
}}
;Fried Tofu
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 5.png
|text1    = Some dreamscapes contain delicious Fried Tofu. The little kitsune would love to collect them all...<br>{{Color|bp|Every dreamscape zone has at most 1 Fried Tofu}}, and when you have yet to collect the one within your current zone, the little kitsune can even detect its fragrance...
}}
;Torii Gates
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 6.png
|text1    = After the little kitsune approaches the torii gate, you can open it to enter the next dreamscape zone.
}}
;Challenge Again
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 7.png
|text1    = Should you find yourself at an impasse, you could try challenging this dreamscape zone again...
}}
;Gloom Shroom
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 8.png
|text1    = A mushroom that has spent too long immersed in nightmares, becoming resentful and dangerous.<br>Only appears in the nightmare state. The little kitsune will {{Color|bp|be knocked out}} upon touching one, so take care to avoid them!
}}
;Magatama Portals
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 9.png
|text1    = The little kitsune can touch magatama to collect them in order to open some doors within the dreamscapes. Some other doors must be unlocked by stepping on stone slates activated by magatama.<br>If you find a hard-to-access magatama, consider the other objects within the dreamscape. Perhaps they could aid you...
}}
;Naruto Tiles
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 10.png
|text1    = Moving tiles, some of which will change direction depending on the dreamscape state you are in. Observe them carefully...
}}
;Ramen Master
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 11.png
|text1    = A Karasu Ramen Master who has suffered the loss of a full day's earnings due to dining-and-dashing customers.<br>Will descend into a fury in the nightmare state and continuously chase the little kitsune, who will {{Color|bp|be knocked out}} upon coming into contact with the Ramen Master.<br>In the sweet dream state, if you're careful enough, you may be able to hop onto his head and borrow his strength...
}}
;Squirrel Worker
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival A Little Fox's Daydream 12.png
|text1    = A squirrel worker in charge of transporting ingredients who will walk to and fro on her own. Prone to nightmares due to overwork.<br>Will descend into a fury in the nightmare state, and the little kitsune will {{Color|bp|be knocked out}} upon coming into contact with her.<br>However, her habits while transporting goods can also be of aid to our foxy protagonist...
}}

==Stages==
===Dreams, Nightmares, and the Hopping-Mad Mushroom===
{{Description|The usual path to the ramen stand presents multiple forms to you within the ever-changing dreamscape! The mushrooms standing in the little kitsune's path are all but swathed in ominous energies. Fortunately, our foxy protagonist does not usually take mushrooms in soup...<br>Is the friend who our main lead intended to meet present at this ramen stand...?}}
Unlocks 2025-02-14 10{{Colon}}00

===Floating Naruto? Vessels of Fresh Flavor!===
{{Description|A little Naruto in the broth always brings out a sweet, refreshing fragrance. In the dreamscape, these fish cakes become tiles that seem to float about like boats, guiding the little kitsune to its delicious stopping-off point...}}

===Ramen Master's Proposal to Ban Dining-and-Dashing===
{{Description|The Karasu Ramen Master is busy every single day, and this fine day, someone's dined and dashed, with the Ramen Master in hot pursuit. Best not to stand between a Master and their vengeance!<br>Will the fox's dear friend still be waiting at this ramen stall, now that the Ramen Master has left it unattended?}}

===The Great Ingredient Melee===
{{Description|The worker squirrel, discombobulated by a dizzying array of work, has begun to wander aimlessly. And the state of her nightmare is more chaotic still...<br>Regardless, the little kitsune has a meeting with her friend to attend, confidence to spare, and key ingredients to find!}}

===Soul-Fused, Hard-Earned Fried Tofu!===
{{Description|May these frustrating nightmares disperse before dreamy, delicious food!<br>The little kitsune bears down upon the final ramen stand, shouldering the Fried Tofu collected along the way. Surely, her friend the little baku waits for her there. To share ingredients gathered along one's trying travail, and add them to steaming soup... Ah, such bliss that would be!}}
